remarks: Evaluate an infinite group sum in a submonoid.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Sep-2015.)
statement:
tsmssubm.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
tsmssubm.1 $e |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) $.
tsmssubm.2 $e |- ( ph -> G e. TopSp ) $.
tsmssubm.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. ( SubMnd ` G ) ) $.
tsmssubm.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> S ) $.
tsmssubm.h $e |- H = ( G |`s S ) $.
tsmssubm $p |- ( ph -> ( H tsums F ) = ( ( G tsums F ) i^i S ) ) $.
